content: once then rounds other end of the needle 72-74 once more knit across bringing yarn behind round 86-87 purl the work continue to round 88 of either cowl or bag below repeat last two steps until your icord is ~24 inches long cowl cobblestone path bind off rounds 88-94 knit stitch pattern weave in ends rounds 95-96 purl alternatively you could use cording or rounds 97-110 repeat rounds 18 - 31 once a ribbon as a drawstring rounds 111-124 twisted rib *k2 tbl p2 thread i-cord through casing on bag repeat from * to end of round and knot ends if desired bind off weave in ends and block if desired bag i-cord casing round 88 knit to the last 2 stitches bobble last 2 stitches of this round and first 2 stitches of next round you will now be working in row row 89 knit row 90 purl row 91-94 repeat row 89-90 twice row 95 purl when you reach the end of the row co 2 stitches place bor marker co 2 stitches and join to work in the round round 96-101 knit bind off in pattern fasten_off leaving a tail that is ~3 times the circumference of the top of the bag fold top of bag at purl round and using a whip stitch seam the bind off round to the first knit round to create a casing for the drawstring weave in ends and block if desired make drawstring rev 1 4/11/2025 darnknitanyway com ©2025 darn knit anyway all rights reserved this is a free pattern stillwater mn 651-342-1386 we hope you make beautiful knit items for yourself or your loved ones
